about_the_game:
Collect All Perks
The game lets you unlock and collect unique active and passive perks to use against your foes. Each perk brings new powers for even more combinations. Uncover new abilities and enhance your run with awesome possibilities.



Create Unique Builds
Create different builds depending on your playstyle! Want to place traps over traps with more traps? Want to throw all of your projectiles at once - with huge explosions? Or just ram everything down in a melee build? That might be for you!



Explore The World
Explore the pixelart world and see where the run will bring you! Use the level and for your advatage and search the detours to get new rewards.



Story
Pandash is a strategic roguelite that takes the player Ryu on a journey to a world where he receives support from a mysterious ghostly realm. In this Roguelite platformer, the player must traverse various areas to gradually free his world from the unknown threat.
During the game, the player can discover and use various perks to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles.

Each use of the perks disrupts the balance of the worlds. The current world and the ghostly realm must remain in harmony. If this harmony is disturbed, Ryu's strength falters and he will feel the direct effects. But perhaps there are also ways to take advantage of this imbalance...
The threatened world that Ryu travels through is full of secrets and dangers. The environment changes every time the player begins his journey. Each journey also means new challenges that he must face.



Join the discord!

short_description: Pandash is a rogue-lite platformer with different perks to discover and balance their powers. On your search for peace for your world, you wander through different areas, which will change every run. You need to get strong enough and unlock everything to survive and reach your destination.
